devdoc.details: This contract executes messages received from layer1 governance on arbitrum. This meant to be an upgradeable contract and it should only be used with TransparentUpgradeableProxy.

params.payLoad: message received from L1 that needs to be executed.*

isInitialized.details: flag to make sure that the initialize function is only called once

l1MessageRelayer().notice: Address of the L1MessageRelayer contract on mainnet.
